page.title: 16Sidmouth Shopping Centre.
page.content: { Sidmouth Shopping Centre}is an example of a modern day shopping centre designed for the retailer and consumer alike. It comprises an indoor area of individual shop units covering a wide spectrum of retailing activities and started trading in mid July 1984. The Centre is located in Sidmouth's busy High Street opposite a supermarket and between the main Post Office, Library and Health Centre. The public benefits from having a great many shopping requirements under one roof. There is no problem of access for those in wheelchairs, since the whole scheme is on one level with no steps.
